```{r solution, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
df1 <- dplyr::tibble(x = 1:10)
df2 <- dplyr::tibble(y = runif(100))
df3 <- dplyr::tibble(z = rnorm(150),
                     m = rnorm(150))

my_l <- list(df1, df2, df3)

my_fct <- function(df_in) {
  out <- c('nrows' = nrow(df_in), 
           'ncols' = ncol(df_in))
  return(out)
}

tab <- sapply(my_l, my_fct)
tab
```
